text: The 2022 unrest in Corsica is a series of ongoing demonstrations and riots that have occurred since March 2022 in Corsica. This is best of a prison attack on Corsican nationalist leader Yvan Colonna. There were rallies in the main cities of Ajaccio, Calvi and Bastia that became violent clashes between police and protestors. Protestors threw stones and flares at gendarmes. ==References== Category:2022 in France Corsica unrest Category:2020s riots Category:March 2022 events Category:April 2022 events
title: 2022 Corsica unrest
